query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'reviews' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'language'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2vUuSS4u8JGEyYT.root --database 8WruFPRUxPMzzwD4ZeeUDg --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'reviews' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'language'
